hu.szabot.transloadit.assembly

Interface IAssemblyBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssemblyBuilder

    public interface IAssemblyBuilder
    Builds up an assembly which will be tried to be created on Transloadit

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFile(java.io.File file)
      Adds file to the current assembly
      void addFile(java.lang.String key, java.io.File file)
      Adds file to the current assembly with specific key
      void addStep(java.lang.String name, IStep step)
      Adds step to the current assembly
      boolean hasNotifyUrl()
      Checks whether the assembly has notify URL
      boolean hasSteps()
      Checks whether the assembly has steps
      boolean hasTemplateID()
      Checks whether the assembly has template ID
      void setAuthExpires(java.util.Date dateTime)
      Sets the expiration datetime of the assembly (as UTC date)
      void setAuthKey(java.lang.String key)
      Do not call directly!
      void setAuthMaxSize(int maxSize)
      Sets the maximum size of the assembly
      void setField(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Sets a custom field in the current assembly
      void setNotifyURL(java.lang.String notifyURL)
      Sets the notification URL of the assembly, which will be requested after assembly is completed
      void setTemplateID(java.lang.String templateID)
      Sets the used template ID of the assmebly (you can create multiple Transloadit templates under your account,please use its unique ID here)
      ApiData toApiData()
      Converts the builder to ApiData and gets the object, which will be the base of the sent Transloadit request

      • addFile

        void addFile(java.io.File file)
             throws FileNotOpenableException
        Adds file to the current assembly
        Parameters:
        file - File to upload
        Throws:
        FileNotOpenableException

      • addFile

        void addFile(java.lang.String key,
           java.io.File file)
             throws InvalidFieldKeyException,
                    FileNotOpenableException
        Adds file to the current assembly with specific key
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the file to be uploaded
        file - File to upload
        Throws:
        InvalidFieldKeyException - Thrown when an invalid (reserved) field key is tried to be used
        FileNotOpenableException - File not exist or not openable.

      • addStep

        void addStep(java.lang.String name,
           IStep step)
        Adds step to the current assembly
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the step
        step - Step to be added

      • hasNotifyUrl

        boolean hasNotifyUrl()
        Checks whether the assembly has notify URL

      • hasTemplateID

        boolean hasTemplateID()
        Checks whether the assembly has template ID
        Returns:
        Existing of set template ID

      • setAuthExpires

        void setAuthExpires(java.util.Date dateTime)
        Sets the expiration datetime of the assembly (as UTC date)
        Parameters:
        dateTime - Expiration datetime

      • setAuthKey

        void setAuthKey(java.lang.String key)
        Do not call directly!

        Transloadit class will override the value. Use Transloadit constructor parameter.

        Sets the authentication key for the assembly

        Parameters:
        key - API key of the user

      • setAuthMaxSize

        void setAuthMaxSize(int maxSize)
        Sets the maximum size of the assembly
        Parameters:
        maxSize - Maximum size (in bytes)

      • setField

        void setField(java.lang.String key,
            java.lang.String value)
              throws InvalidFieldKeyException,
                     AlreadyDefinedKeyException
        Sets a custom field in the current assembly
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the field
        value - Value of the field
        Throws:
        InvalidFieldKeyException - Thrown when an invalid (reserved) field key is tried to be used
        AlreadyDefinedKeyException - Thrown when an already defined key (in files or in fields) is tried to be used

      • setNotifyURL

        void setNotifyURL(java.lang.String notifyURL)
        Sets the notification URL of the assembly, which will be requested after assembly is completed
        Parameters:
        notifyURL - Notification URL (e.g.: 'http://my.domain.me/application')

      • setTemplateID

        void setTemplateID(java.lang.String templateID)
        Sets the used template ID of the assmebly (you can create multiple Transloadit templates under your account,please use its unique ID here)
        Parameters:
        templateID - Template ID of the assmebly

      • toApiData

        ApiData toApiData()
        Converts the builder to ApiData and gets the object, which will be the base of the sent Transloadit request
        Returns:
        Data to be sent to Transloadit backend

      • hasSteps

        boolean hasSteps()
        Checks whether the assembly has steps
